Well, I don't really HATE hip hop music in the real sense of the word “HATE”… For me, oftentimes if I happen to go with some hip hop song, usually then I find myself irritated and disheartened and disinterested … And bored? Yeah bored.. Not because hip hop isn't awesome or something. It's just that I feel the magic of it is having a very shameful death.. While I do enjoy fusion music genres like contemporary R&B, where you can have that jazz feel and hip hop, etc. I don't really find contemporary hip hop songs are worth listening to. While there are some artists to whom I do listen. Like kayne west, Eminem, Drake, etc. I don't really listen them on daily basis. Just occasionally … Just sometimes.. When I wanna have something different in head. Think about it, why would I be listening to those immature jerks who sing in a way that looks like they even dunno a single word they are uttering, who look like complete fools and dumbest and who think self deceivingly that it makes them somehow look more cool as artists. (it's subjective view by the way) who are just boasting endlessly something very stupid that one can't understand. I have to listen carefully to their each line to understand what they just said. Not that what they are singing is something of kantian philosophy or of great complexity. It's just pure shit uttered in childish manner of blabbering. It's really hard (or at least I find it so hard) to understand a word of what they are singing (which doesn't sound like singing at all) apart from few lines that they keep repeating as if they hold some golden meaning engraved. Most of the songs and their lyrics are just complete trash. Songs about drugs and bars and what not … Yes.. There are songs, yeah, hip hop songs, which are really great. I'm not denying that. For sure. I do like some aspects of this genre, like those witty lyrics n all.. And even sometimes I do need and I mean really NEED to have hip hop ringing in my head.. But it's only Sometimes …sometimes.. though looking at its contemporary state, I find it dull and … well I have already described how I feel about it. So yeah. That's it…
